title: What should I do?
body:
When I play any besides ADC I win my lane but bot feeds. I beat a garen as riven but our jinx thinks you have to be melee range to attack garen.

When I play ADC my team feeds so hard I can't even carry.

What should I do?

replies.body: Play jungle best place to carry from.  Or play properly and don't be a %%%% to your team mates.{{champion:17}} {{item:3157}}
i actually feel like jungle is the best place to carry from as well, however some people can't jungle to save their mothers so it may not work for OP

Play Jungle.

Honestly, either play someone who can steamroll a game like Riven who can 1v5 when fed.
or play ADC and play it well. A good ADC can carry a lot of games. You simply have to be in the mindset, "im playing with monkeys, expect nothing, carry"

don't expect peel or anything. just play smart.
unless there's a blitz, then just cry

Play decent-scaling champions with strong mid-game spikes. Vi, Ori, Malphite. Just make the biggest impact you can, as early as you can and continue to propel your team forward.

You don't want to play champions that fall off, are team reliant, need to farm for 40 minutes to be relevant, or are unpopular to the point that your teammates won't know what to expect from you.

Maybe you start roaming?

It's a team game.

It's cringe-worthy listening to a Gold player player say this.

Oh wait, this is OCE. Nvm.

Don't expect low elo to know how to roam.

Ya.

Well Gold is pretty trash, i consider them low elo still.

Its the same in all regions mate.
